unnormalised: IIT Bombay has announced the 2nd round of seat allotment for its M.Tech programs on 20/06/2024. Candidates can check the results on the official website iitb.ac.in. Reporting deadline is 27/06/2024.
normalised: I-I-T Bombay has announced the second round of seat allotment for its M-Tech programs on twentieth June two thousand and twenty four. Candidates can check the results on the official website i-i-t-b dot a-c dot i-n. Reporting deadline is twenty seventh June two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The cutoff for CSE (Computer Science and Engineering) closed at a GATE score of 750 this year, slightly higher than last year's 730. For EE (Electrical Engineering), the cutoff is at 680. Students are advised to keep their original documents ready for verification.
normalised: The cutoff for C-S-E (Computer Science and Engineering) closed at a G-A-T-E score of seven hundred and fifty this year, slightly higher than last year's seven hundred and thirty. For E-E (Electrical Engineering), the cutoff is at six hundred and eighty. Students are advised to keep their original documents ready for verification.

unnormalised: Applicants who have been allotted seats are required to pay the admission fee of Rs. 50,000 by the deadline to confirm their admission. Failure to do so will result in cancellation of the allotted seat. Details of document verification are available on the admission portal under the 'Instructions' section.
normalised: Applicants who have been allotted seats are required to pay the admission fee of rupees fifty thousand by the deadline to confirm their admission. Failure to do so will result in cancellation of the allotted seat. Details of document verification are available on the admission portal under the 'Instructions' section.

unnormalised: Further rounds of seat allocation may be announced based on the availability of seats. Keep checking the website for updates and important dates like 05/07/2024, when the next announcement is expected.
normalised: Further rounds of seat allocation may be announced based on the availability of seats. Keep checking the website for updates and important dates like fifth July two thousand and twenty four, when the next announcement is expected.
